page.title: 15Littlecote House
page.content: strict to allow the men to play games. Also in the Hall was a finger stock. It was the property of Judge Popham. There were holes in a piece of wood and a sort of top which came over trapping your fingers. The only way to get free was to break your fingers. We all had a go in the stocks, but I could get my finger out easily because my hands were only little, Some of the boys could not get their fingers out. The next room we went into was the{Chinese}Room.We looked at the walls and we noticed that on each side of the walls was a piece of Chinese wall-paper.Each piece represented a season Spring,Summer,Autumn,Winter. There were also lots of Chinese ornaments some were made of Rubys.Every thing in the Chinese room
